humptyDumpty.name: Humpty Dumpty
humptyDumpty.description: The first pinball machine to feature flippers, though they faced outward rather than inward.

slickChick.name: Slick Chick
slickChick.description: A classic wedgehead featuring playboy bunny inspired pop bumpers.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Famous for its spinning disk, zipper flippers, and captive ball messengers.

blackKnight.name: Black Knight
blackKnight.description: Introduced the 'Magna-Save' feature and was the first machine to feature a split-level playfield.
blackKnight.tournamentNotes: Tends to play very fast. Ensure the magna-save magnets are fully operational before any IFPA event.
blackKnight.ownerRequirements: DO NOT use abrasive cleaners on the upper playfield. Please wipe down the glass after league play.
blackKnight.ownerNotes: Bought from Steve in 2021. The speech board sometimes crackles, need to recap it eventually. Currently missing the original coin door lock.

eightBallDeluxe.name: Eight Ball Deluxe
eightBallDeluxe.description: Quit talking and start chalking! A classic pool-themed game with iconic speech.

addamsFamily.name: The Addams Family
addamsFamily.description: The best-selling pinball machine of all time, featuring the motorized Thing hand.

attackFromMars.name: Attack from Mars
attackFromMars.description: Save the Earth from Martian invasion by destroying their flying saucers.

medievalMadness.name: Medieval Madness
medievalMadness.description: Battle for the kingdom by destroying the castle, trolls, and rescuing the damsel.

spiderMan.name: Spider-Man
spiderMan.description: Defeat Doc Ock, Green Goblin, Sandman, and Venom with web-slinging action.

godzilla.name: Godzilla
godzilla.description: Help Godzilla defeat Mechagodzilla and Xiliens with a collapsing building feature.
